lead_paragraph: KAPLAN--Gilbert. The Juilliard School community mourns the passing of Gilbert Kaplan, a member of the school's Evening Division faculty since 2000 and devoted supporter of the arts around the world. Through his popular courses on Mahler for music lovers, Gil brought his extraordinary expertise and passion to a composer whose work is better understood through his scholarship and performances. We extend our deepest condolences to his wife, Lena, and his beautiful family. He will be deeply missed by all. Joseph W. Polisi, President; Ara Guzelimian, Provost and Dean; Danielle La Senna, Director of Juilliard's Evening Division 1/3
